title: Closing stock prices for Akef Inc. on Wednesday
summary: This graph shows the Akef stock Closing share Price Inc. the Week .
They steadily climb Mon to Wed from just over £ 50 on Monday peaking at £ 72 on Wednesday .
They then plummet to £ 21 on Thursday and fall again to just under £ 10 on Friday .
gold: The chart shows the closing stock prices for AKEF inc on different days of the week . Monday saw a stock price of £ 51 . Tuesday and Wednesday saw a rise to £ 74 .
